title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Understanding Core Roles for Dental Educator Capacity Building

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Explain the four core roles of dental educators (education, research, administration, clinical practice) within professional contexts
Identify three or more competency domains from 12 total that are essential for language education administrators
Literature-based discussions can propose educator development strategies within the team
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
